name: Space Clicky ATL SPACE CHALLENGE 2021
description:
Space Clicky game 

Coding and Design by H.Jatin Vikash, 8A, Ambience Public School 

Planets and Spaceship design: Barnil Das and Evin Mathew Varghese, 8A, Ambience Public School.

Click on the Asteroids flying towards you using your mouse. Have a journey around our exciting solar system dodging and destroying the obstacles, flying in the spaceship using arrow keys.

note: Each Asteroid is 5 points. Score 50  points to win and end the game.
